Introduction

Gangkiz (Korean: 갱키즈; Japanese: ギャングキッズ) was a seven-member girl group under Core Contents Media (now known as MBK Entertainment). They officially debuted on May 16, 2012 with the mini-album We Became Gang.In April 2014, it was announced that all members except Esther and Hyeji had left the group, it is assumed that the two remaining members have disbanded sometime in 2014.
